attributes.action: REDUCE UNIVERSITY FEES - A FAIR FUTURE FOR ALL.
attributes.additional_details: University will soon be a priviledge only for the rich. More and more talented teenagers across the UK are facing the prospect of not being able to pursue their dreams of a career as they simply cannot afford to come away from university with a £30,000-£40,000 debt. That debt can and will last a lifetime. THESE PEOPLE ARE OUR FUTURE, THE NEXT GENERATION, LET'S SHOW THEM OUR SUPPORT AND TAKE THIS MATTER TO PARLIAMENT ONCE AGAIN!
